entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
